subnotes.content:
INSTRUCTIONS: As part of your research inquiry in selecting an archival record, please use the catalog number so that LWLC Archives staff can readily identify the archival record of your choice.


Record 001a - Newspaper, "Worth Remembering, Montgomery's First Black Police Officer"
Date: September 9, 2001
Catalog Number: 2007.020.001.001a


Record 001b - Flag, United States Cloth flag provided for military service
Date: 1983
Catalog Number: 2007.020.001.001b


Record 002a - Newspaper, "Dr. M.L. King's Assassination Tips Scales in Favor of Final Passage of Open Housing Bill"
Date: April 10, 1968
Catalog Number: 2007.020.001.002


Record 002b - Personal Check, Written to Will S. Massey of $60 from the First National Bank of Montgomery
Date: 1954
Catalog Number: 2007.020.001.002b


Record 003 - Personal Check, Written to Will S. Massey of $25 from the First National Bank of Montgomery
Date: 1954
Catalog Number: 2007.020.001.003


Record 004 - Commemorative Certificate of Will S. Massey
Date: 1963-1968
Catalog Number: 2007.020.001.004


Record 005 - Honorable Discharge from the Army of the United States
Date: March 18, 1918
Catalog Number: 2007.020.001.005


Record 006 - Enlistment Record of William Massey
Date: January 31, 1957
Catalog Number: 2007.020.001.006


Record 007 - Letter sent to William Massey from attorney Lew A. Sanderson
Date: March 16, 1949
Catalog Number: 2007.020.001.007
